duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage inbound and outbound patient calls and inquiries.
Conduct patient interviews and create accurate, comprehensive medication lists.
Coordinate clinical service visits between pharmacists and patients.
Ensure call resolution by discussing the purpose of the call, effectively addressing all concerns, and escalating calls as necessary according to protocol.
Manage challenging patient situations by responding promptly to patient needs and service requests.
Embrace a continuous quality improvement approach by proactively identifying areas of improvement and communicating those ideas to the clinical services team.
Conduct follow-up evaluations with patients and participate in other activities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Current Pharmacy Technician (CPhT) or Medical Assistant Certification
Fluency in multiple languages is a bonus
